author: Scott Ingram
description: Fantastically complex with notes of rum, maraschino, sherry and orange.
recipeIngredient: 75 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker
DRY SHAKE (without ice) to emulsify and fine strain into chilled glass
